ygData.subject: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: As much as I like to have my character forever, I know I will have to quit one day. So, I ve been taking screenshots of my character s developement. As most of
ygData.messageBody:
As much as I like to have my character forever, I know I will have to quit
one day. So, I've been taking screenshots of my character's developement. As
most of you know, I always strive to be coolest looking Shadow Knight
around. Thus, I arrange my armor to be the most fashionable as possible,
despite the less AC. To make a long story short, I would like to see other
Dark Elf SKs in action or posing (don't really want to see Ogres and Trolls
because they are not as awesome-looking). If you got a cool, spiffy
screenshot of your SK in .jpg format, please send it my way at
howard.chan@... . Btw, did I mention that we need the lifetap series?
hehe
